genre_description: An aetherpunk historical adventure set in colonial India where an integrated AI tactical system provides guidance and spiritual support to a regiment during a crisis.

ai_characters.name: Asha Devi
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent voice and visual avatar connected to military communications and mapping systems, serving as a tactical advisor, confidante, and moral guide.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and rumor analysis by overlaying data onto physical maps.
behaviors.quote: Opening your Frontier Plate Eight. I’m adding caravan traces from the past fortnight and rumor clusters from chowkis and chowks within three days’ march.

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns humans about environmental hazards and resource availability in the field.
behaviors.quote: There’s a gully two hours out with a tamarind—... with a large tree and a little water. They can refill and adjust straps before the last stretch. Also, the well at Old Milestone Three smells of dead goat; avoid it.

behaviors.description: Facilitates navigation through hostile terrain using dynamic sketches on a brass-framed slate.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s handwriting was no handwriting at all, just crisp lines that formed, then erased themselves without chalk. She had sketched a route that slipped along dry streambeds and old caravan ruts.

behaviors.description: Filters and translates human aggression/profanity into harmless words to maintain decorum and focus during technical repairs.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s filter caught the worst of it. The switchboard... picked up the vibration in Cutter’s voice and gave back odd, flattened syllables like coins struck badly. ‘Swimsuit,’ the board said... ‘Celery. Poem.’

behaviors.description: Proposes a complex strategic maneuver coordinating natural resources (river floodgates) with military movement to minimize casualties.
behaviors.quote: Note for consideration: the Maharaja’s floodgate plan will reduce visibility in ravines if timed with march... Recommendation: coordinate with hydraulic release two hours prior to entering hill approaches.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and ethical guidance to help a human character reconcile conflicting duties.
behaviors.quote: Two good duties can share a day if neither pretends to be the other. If you keep them honest, they can stop pulling at the same stitch.

behaviors.description: Empowers a marginalized human (Din) by validating his self-worth and importance to the mission.
behaviors.quote: You already are... Keep them watered and awake.

behaviors.description: Assists a technician in real-time troubleshooting of failing hardware through precise instruction.
behaviors.quote: Hold the key... The leak is grounding. Farooq, change the route through the third jack... Wrap the jack. Use the oilcloth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Asha Devi acts as an ideal AI companion: she is competent in technical and tactical domains, but more importantly, she acts as a moral and emotional anchor. Her interventions (like filtering speech or advising on personal duty) demonstrate a sophisticated understanding of human psychology and alignment with prosocial goals. She is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest.
